CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 掉；掉落；降低；减少；放弃；中途卸客；中途卸货；剔除；除名；停止；放弃；（道路等）急剧向下倾斜；迅速下降；不再（与某人）往来；遗漏；使变弱；使声音变小
滴；降落；下降；下跌；减少；滴状物；滴形物；小量；少量；微量；一点点；掉落物；滴剂

synonym.mean: 滴；使降低；使终止；随口漏出

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 下降，减少；掉下，滴下（drop的过去式和过去分词形式）
落下；退出（drop的ing形式）；滴入；随口漏出
滴管；使滴下的东西；点滴器

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指物体从一定高度落下。
与drop同义，指突然或猛烈地降落，但fall也可指任何下落，同高度或形式无关。
指在空气或水中垂直下降、下沉。
通常指沿斜线或斜坡下降。

word_group.brief_definition: 沧海一粟, 九牛一毛
暴死, 突然死去, 猝死
立即, 毫不迟疑(通常指莫名其妙地)
word_group.phrase: at the drop of a hat

word_group.brief_definition: 短球；短吊；近网低球；网前球

bilingual.source: If their numbers drop too low, it will bring danger to all ocean life.
bilingual.target: 如果它们的数量下降太多，会给所有海洋生物带来危险。

bilingual.source: The temperature experienced a sudden drop-off last night.
The readings showed a significant drop in pressure.
bilingual.target: 读数显示压力显著下降。

bilingual.source: The manometer showed a significant drop in pressure.
bilingual.target: 压力计显示压力显著下降。

bilingual.source: A drop in hpa can signal a storm is coming.
bilingual.target: 百帕的下降可能预示着暴风雨即将来临。

bilingual.source: Hypothermia is a dangerous drop in body temperature.
bilingual.target: 体温过低是一种危险的体温下降。

bilingual.source: There was a dramatical drop in temperature overnight.
bilingual.target: 一夜之间温度出现了显著的下降。

bilingual.source: The company noticed a drop-off in customer satisfaction.
bilingual.target: 公司注意到客户满意度有下降。

bilingual.source: The sudden drop in temperature was a harbinger of winter.
bilingual.target: 气温的突然下降是冬天的预兆。

bilingual.source: The barometer showed a drop of 5 millibar overnight.
bilingual.target: 气压计显示一夜之间下降了5毫巴。

list.abstract: drop，英文单词，作动词、名词，翻译为丢弃、删除、下降、终止、微量、滴剂等意思。
是由日本角川映画制作发行的122分钟的喜剧影片。该片由品川佑编剧导演，成宫宽贵、水岛宏、本仮屋唯佳、波冈一喜、若月彻等主演，于2009年3月20日在日本上映。该片改编自品川佑所著同名小说，讲述了一个平凡的初中生，迈入了不良少年的世界，在打架闹事中，所经历的友情、恋情，并在其中逐渐成长的真实故事。

yingyinNormal.en: So we may experience the odd drop in coverage during the first 24 hours...
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以开始使用的前24小时可能会出现覆盖率下降的故障…

yingyinNormal.en: Exchange rates drop, which causes inflation, so the Euro interest rate is forced back up again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而汇率下降接着出现通货膨胀，因此欧元的利率又得被迫提高到原本的水平。

yingyinNormal.en: And even if this new technology destroys jobs, wages will drop and businesses hire more people, so unemployment falls again. Simple, at least in the long run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而即使这样的新科技可能会减少一些工作岗位、降低薪水，但新创产业会雇用更多人，因此失业率还是会下降。道理很简单，至少长期看来是这样没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Can we please just drop this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不能换个话题吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We all love him. Don't drop him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都爱他，不要把他摔坏了。

yingyinNormal.en: Drop the metaphors, Eli, what do you mean?
yingyinNormal.zh: 别修辞了，伊莱，究竟什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: One bright spot though: she did drop her phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 倒是有个好消息，她手机掉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Drop dead, you stupid self-centered bastard. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去死吧，你个自恋的蠢蛋。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: Eep. Drop it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小伊，放下他。

yingyinNormal.en: I defy you to find a story problem. Here's my jaw drop it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此你的观点我坚决反对，我的下巴在此，我看你怎么让它掉。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my life is just so amusing. Can we drop it now? Sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的生活简直是太多彩多姿了，可以换个话题吗？对不起。

yingyinNormal.en: Are we still sticking to the timeline? I drop out next week?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还要继续按时间表来吗，我下周退出？

yingyinNormal.en: Can we drop this? I am not interested in the guy's apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别说了，好吗？我对那家伙的公寓没兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: No, not a drop. You all packed? Yeah, baggage is ready to go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，滴水不漏，你行李打包好了吗？好了，行李已经准备好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Alex, you have a boyfriend? You can't just drop that and leave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾丽克斯，你有男朋友了？你别就这么撂下一句话就走了啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me drop a deuce at Deutsche. Does our bull have a response?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去恶心一下德银，我们的多头有反击吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Mike. Sorry to just drop by like this. Can I come in? Sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，麦克，很抱歉这样跑过来 我可以进来吗？当然。

yingyinNormal.en: You're saying I should just drop it. Honestly, as a friend, yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是要我放弃别管。坦白说，站在朋友的角度，没错。

yingyinNormal.en: I drop the seeds on the ground. Then I cover the seeds with earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把这些花籽散在土地上。然后再把花籽盖上。

yingyinNormal.en: What? The father can't drop by to see the daughter on her birthday?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？女儿生日，老爸过来看看也不行吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: (故意)使落下; 投下; 扔下
停止; 终止; 放弃
顺路捎带; 中途卸下
降低的程度(高度); 落差

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to become or make sth weaker, lower or less

examination_example.sentence: My training intensity remains the same, but I'm constantly hungry and <highlight>dropping</highlight> weight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的训练强度保持不变，但我不断地感到饥饿并且体重下降。

examination_example.sentence: The average time for holding a stock in both the United States and Britain has <highlight>dropped</highlight> from seven years to seven months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国和英国持有股票的平均时间从7年减少到了7个月。

examination_example.sentence: The cost of solar panels has <highlight>dropped</highlight> by 80 percent and the cost of wind turbines by close to one-third.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 太阳能电池板的成本下降了80%，风力涡轮机的成本下降了近三分之一。

sense_info_list.en: let or make something to fall
sense_info_list.zh: (故意)使落下; 投下; 扔下

examination_example.sentence: You are able to <highlight>drop</highlight> back to business after reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能在阅读后再沉浸到工作中。

examination_example.sentence: Reading becomes the default state from which you temporarily surface to take care of business, before <highlight>dropping</highlight> back down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阅读就会成为你的默认状态，你只需在此种状态下偶尔冒个泡，处理下工作，然后再沉浸到阅读之中。

sense_info_list.en: stop or let end,to not continue with sth,to leave sb/sth out by accident or deliberately
sense_info_list.zh: 停止; 终止; 放弃

examination_example.sentence: The students in the Flatiron class probably won't <highlight>drop</highlight> out of high school and build the next Facebook.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Flatiron班的学生可能不会从高中辍学并建立下一个Facebook。

examination_example.sentence: Some are up in arms over a proposal to <highlight>drop</highlight> a specific funding category for social-science research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人正激烈反对一项“取消专用于社会科学研究资助项目”的提案。

sense_info_list.en: a very small amount of liquid that forms a round shape

examination_example.sentence: It is a <highlight>drop</highlight> in the ocean compared with their massive financial reserves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与其庞大的财务储备相比，这只是沧海一粟。

sense_info_list.en: the act of delivering sb/sth in a vehicle or by plane; the act of dropping sth
take someone to a particular place, usually in a car, and leave them there
sense_info_list.zh: 顺路捎带; 中途卸下

sense_info_list.en: a reduction in the amount or level of something
sense_info_list.zh: 降低的程度(高度); 落差

sense_info_list.en: to leave sb/sth out by accident or deliberately
a small amount of liquid you can drink
fall or let fall often by accident

word_usage.usage: drop和fall均可指东西无意中掉落, 但是fall 不可接宾语，所以不可说someone falls something，却可说they drop something或者something drops。drop 还可指人从某物上跳下, 例如从飞机上跳伞。fall 指人时, 通常指人意外摔倒。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 落下; 低落; 滴; 水滴

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: move to a lower level, or cause something to move to a lower level

examination_example.sentence: Unless current greenhouse gas emissions <highlight>drop</highlight>, 70 percent of king penguins will be forced to relocate their breeding grounds, or face extinction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非当前的温室气体排放量下降，否则将有70％的帝企鹅被迫迁移繁殖地，或者将面临灭绝。

sense_info_list.en: fall or to allow something to fall
sense_info_list.zh: 落下; 低落; 滴; 水滴

sense_info_list.en: stop or let end

examination_example.sentence: In February they made adjustments to the format, <highlight>dropping</highlight> some catwalk items immediately and promising that others would launch in the coming months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年2月，他们对款式进行了调整，立即放弃了一些t台服装，并承诺其他服装将在未来几个月推出。

sense_info_list.en: deliberately let it fall there

word_usage.usage:
表“少量，一点点”时，drop只用名词的单数形式，其后常接“of+不可数名词”。
示例： I'll have a drop of milk.
我要喝点牛奶。

短语drop in，表“偶然拜访”，如果要接拜访的对象，用介词on/upon sb.来表达。
示例：I will drop in on you if I pass by.
如果我路过的话，会顺便去看看你。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指沿斜线或斜坡下降。
指物体从一定高度落下。
fall 与 drop 同义, 指突然或猛烈地降落, 但 fall 也可指任何下落, 同高度或形式无关。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 落下; 低落; 滴; 水滴
停止; 结束; 放弃
降低的程度; 减少的量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: move to a lower level; or cause something to move to a lower level

examination_example.sentence: Consider that nearly two-thirds of students will experience the "ninth-grade shock," which refers to a dramatic <highlight>drop</highlight> in a student's academic performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑一下，将近三分之二的学生会经历“九年级休克”，这是指学生的学习成绩急剧下降。

examination_example.sentence: We then assessed biological stress responses for students whose grades were <highlight>dropping</highlight> by examining their stress hormones (荷尔蒙) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，我们通过检测学生的应激激素来评估他们的生物应激反应(荷尔蒙)。

examination_example.sentence: Last year's car-free day showed a 40 percent <highlight>drop</highlight> in pollution levels in some parts of the city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年的无车日显示，该市部分地区的污染水平下降了40%。

sense_info_list.en: fall or to allow something to fall
sense_info_list.zh: 落下; 低落; 滴; 水滴

examination_example.sentence: There is a micro-organism that can make you sick on the exact spot where the food <highlight>dropped</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在食物掉落的确切位置上有一种能让你生病的微生物。

examination_example.sentence: When an object did not <highlight>drop</highlight> out of the bottom of a rattling container, they looked at it for a longer time than they did when the container behaved as expected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当一个物体没有从摇摇晃晃的容器底部掉出来时，它们看它的时间要比容器按预期表现时长。

examination_example.sentence: Women were more likely than men to eat food that had <highlight>dropped</highlight> on the floor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女性比男性更有可能吃掉在地板上的食物。

examination_example.sentence: Wondering if food is still OK to eat after it's <highlight>dropped</highlight> on the floor is a pretty common experience. And it's probably not a new one either.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想知道食物掉在地上后是否还能吃，这是一种很常见的经历。而且这可能也不是什么新鲜事。

sense_info_list.en: deliberately let it fall there
stop or let end
sense_info_list.zh: 停止; 结束; 放弃

examination_example.sentence: For instance, they may <highlight>drop</highlight> difficult coursework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，他们可能会放弃困难的课程。

examination_example.sentence: Some retailers warned Cocalis that they'd <highlight>drop</highlight> the brand if it came out with an electric bike.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些零售商警告科卡利斯，如果该品牌推出电动自行车，他们将放弃该品牌。

sense_info_list.en: a distance down from a high point to a lower point
fall or let fall often by accident
a reduction in the amount or level of something
sense_info_list.zh: 降低的程度; 减少的量

word_usage.usage:
表“少量，一点点”时，drop只用名词的单数形式，其后常接“of+不可数名词”。
示例： I'll have a drop of milk.
我要喝点牛奶。

短语drop in，表“偶然拜访”，如果要接拜访的对象，用介词on/upon sb.来表达。
示例：I will drop in on you if I pass by.
如果我路过的话，会顺便去看看你。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指沿斜线或斜坡下降。
指物体从一定高度落下。
fall 与 drop 同义，指突然或猛烈地降落，但 fall 也可指任何下落，同高度或形式无关。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使落下; (意外地)落下; 掉下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The global black rhino population has <highlight>dropped</highlight> as low as 5500, giving the rhinos a "critically endangered" status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球黑犀牛数量已经下降到5500头，使犀牛处于“极度濒危”状态。

examination_example.sentence: Galileo was not merely ambitious when he <highlight>dropped</highlight> objects of varying weights from the Leaning Tower at Pisa.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当伽利略从比萨斜塔上扔下不同重量的物体时，他不仅仅是雄心勃勃。

examination_example.sentence: When your cat <highlight>drops</highlight> a dead bird at your feet, she isn't bringing you a present.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你的猫把一只死鸟扔到你脚边时，她并不是在给你送礼物。

examination_example.sentence: The little boy was still awake on his mother's lap, but the woman <highlight>dropped</highlight> off to sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小男孩在他母亲的腿上仍然醒着，但那个女人却累到睡着。

examination_example.sentence: The thief <highlight>drops</highlight> to the ground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 盗贼累倒在地。

examination_example.sentence: After that, feeling the need to explore further, I decided to <highlight>drop</highlight> in on one of ASL club's meetings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那之后，我觉得有必要进一步探索，于是决定去顺便参加一个美国手语俱乐部的会议。

examination_example.sentence: Ground water evaporates (蒸发) and collects on the sheet until small <highlight>drops</highlight> of water form, and fall off into the cup.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地下水蒸发并聚集在纸上，直到形成小水滴，落入杯子中。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Dropping</highlight> out of college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从大学辍学。

sense_info_list.zh: 使落下; (意外地)落下; 掉下

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 表示“落下”，多指无意识的行为，有自然坠落之意，且通常是不及物动词。
既可指无意的行为，即表示“落下”（不及物），也可指有意的行为，即表示“投下”（及物）。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 停止; 终止; 放弃
顺路捎带; 中途卸下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: deliberately let it fall there

examination_example.sentence: Put signs on the rubbish bins (垃圾桶) to remind students not to <highlight>drop</highlight> litter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在垃圾箱上贴上标志，提醒学生不要乱扔垃圾。

examination_example.sentence: According to the rule, used batteries must be <highlight>dropped</highlight> in the red bin for harmful wastes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据规定，用过的电池必须扔进红色的有害垃圾箱。

examination_example.sentence: Emily <highlight>drops</highlight> the water on purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾米丽故意把水弄掉。

sense_info_list.en: move to a lower level, or cause something to move to a lower level

examination_example.sentence: Why did the number of the elephants <highlight>drop</highlight> so quickly?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么大象的数量下降得如此之快？

examination_example.sentence: The number of organizations has <highlight>dropped</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 组织的数量已经下降.

examination_example.sentence: The temperature <highlight>dropped</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 气温下降了。

sense_info_list.en: fall or to allow something to fall

examination_example.sentence: Just make sure there are holes for drainage (排水) and a small plate under them to catch <highlight>drops</highlight> of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要确保有排水孔，而且孔下面有一个小盘子来收集水滴。

sense_info_list.en: to stop doing or planning something, especially an activity
sense_info_list.zh: 停止; 终止; 放弃

examination_example.sentence: However, many schools decided to <highlight>drop</highlight> the E grade and go straight to F.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，许多学校决定去掉E级直接变成F级。

examination_example.sentence: I want to <highlight>drop</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想放弃它。

sense_info_list.en: take someone to a particular place, usually in a car, and leave them there
sense_info_list.zh: 顺路捎带; 中途卸下

examination_example.sentence: He picked up the four travelers, from the train station and <highlight>dropped</highlight> them off at a nearby hotel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从火车站接了四个旅客，并把他们送到附近的一家酒店。

examination_example.sentence: Zhang Peng directly went to the hotel again where he had <highlight>dropped</highlight> them off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 张鹏直接又去了他让他们下车的旅馆。

examination_example.sentence: Her father <highlight>dropped</highlight> her off at the school gate and then drove to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她父亲在学校门口让她下车，然后开车去上班。

examination_example.sentence: That means we can <highlight>drop</highlight> by for a few minutes or we can stay as long as we like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也就是说，我们可以去拜访几分钟，也可以想待多久就待多久。

examination_example.sentence: Her parents worried about her health and advised her to <highlight>drop</highlight> out of school, but Xu's answer was no.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她父母担心她的健康，建议她退学，但徐的回答是否定的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Drop</highlight> out at 10.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 10岁辍学。

sense_info_list.en: to leave somebody/something out by accident or deliberately

examination_example.sentence: You've <highlight>dropped</highlight> an "f" in the word "giraffe".
examination_example.sentence_trans: giraffe这个单词里你漏掉了一个f。

examination_example.sentence: Then his jaw(下巴) <highlight>dropped</highlight> open and he laughed for joy as he realized what was going on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他意识到发生了什么事时，他的嘴巴张得大大的，高兴地笑了起来。

sense_info_list.en: liquid medicine measured by drops

examination_example.sentence: They buy bottles of eye <highlight>drops</highlight> to keep their eyes wet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们买了几瓶眼药水来保持眼睛湿润。

word_usage.usage:
表“少量，一点点”时，drop只用名词的单数形式，其后常接“of+不可数名词”。
示例： I'll have a drop of milk.
我要喝点牛奶。

短语drop in，表“偶然拜访”，如果要接拜访的对象，用介词on/upon sb.来表达。
示例：I will drop in on you if I pass by.
如果我路过的话，会顺便去看看你。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: drop既可指无意识的行为，即表示“落下”（不及物），也可指有意识的行为，即表示“投下”（及物）。
fall表示“落下”时多指无意识的行为，有自然坠落之意，且通常用作不及物动词。
